rev.comment: Robot - Moving category Irish Americans to American people of Irish descent per [[WP:CFD|CFD]] at [[Wikipedia:Categories for discussion/Log/2010 February 17]].
removing controversial claim from the lede, feel free to add a supporting citation and replace, thanks
INDICATED NEED FOR CITATION CONCERNING TULKU ASSERTION
this shouldn't be in lead, since its already stated in early life section; also, restored protection icon and minor clean up
Changes being made per OTRS Legal Queue ticket #2010010610026164. Please do not revert (even in part) without first contacting me to discuss.
